GEREHU BAS STOP (poem)
Kainkain Meri kainkain man
Sanap ol yet o holim han
Lo Gerehu basstop moning yet
Longpla yau-ring sotpla sket
Kat han set na speks lo ai
Pasindia sanap na pes I drai
Wan aua nau na neks wan kam
Ai sait t’sol taim bas I kam
Nain kam stop na dua I op
Hap bruk ol pasim lo rop
Pipia lo ai simuk lo maus
Bik moning yet ol lusim haus
Man meri na pikinini tu
Kam yet lo Six Tri na Tu
Mi tokim yu: pait lo kalap lo nain
Husait tok bai sanap lo lain?
Manmeri pus na sumatin ras
Olsem tru Mosbi nogat bas
Wokman na man nogat wok
“Kalap t’sol yumu olgeta wok!”
Skul mangi tu i no laik leit
Sampla wet lo haiskul get
Spit I kam lo kalap lo bas
“Yumi wet bai no gat bas”
Mama holim windo blo bas
Dres ap gut i no bisi lo das
Longpla yau-ring sotpla sket
Bamim nus blo kat han set
Husait tok bai em g’im sans
Em tu les lo wet inap lans
Sampla senkens na bas pulap
Speks lo ai nogat sans lo kalap
Mi sanap lo sait na kandim ken
Tupla tripla… no sixpla man
Hangamap lo dua na strongim han
Draiva daaai lo ol manmeri ron
Presim baten na musik i on
No long taim bai koins pairap
Lo han blo boskru taim em sanap
“Bas fe! Bas fe! Heidi toea bas fe!”
“Heidi toea.. Heidi toea bas fe!”
Mi blari taet lo ronim bas
“Powes Pakop baim bikpla bas!”

Cybercrime kes i ko hed blong inkris
Samples tri kes blong cybercrime we Polis i rikodem long wan wik.
Wetem ol rikod ia, polis i manej blong adresem.
Polis Ofisa blong Cyber Crime, Sergeant Jeff Natapei, i talem se ol top kes we polis i karem evri wik hemi long yus blong social media, we i kat image abuse, threatening, o man i tok nogud long nara man online.
Sergeant Natapei i talem se hemi wan ol taem aktiviti from man hemi filim i had blong expresem hem physicali, so hemi yusum internet.
Mbe hemi talem se wetem niufala cybercrime loa o jenis long Penal Code act, bae i givim olgeta ol stret guideline long hao bai oli save dil wetem ol isu mo kriminal aktiviti online.
Naoia Vanuatu Polis hemi stap wok kolosap wetem Cyber-safety Pacific, blong trenem ol ofisa.
“Save blong yumi long loa ia se hemi niu mo polis tu i stap traem blong bildim ap hem blong traem develop. Polis loa enfosmen i mas kam antap blong adresem ol rabis fasen ia from plante man i kam viktim blong cybercrime,” Sergeant Natapei i talem.
“Cyber safety pasifika hemi wan regional program, we Kavman blong Australia i fandem tru long Australian Federal Polis mo Pacific Island Chief Polis we vanuatu polis fos hemi wan memba blong hem,
“Mo hemia nao yumi ko tru long awenes blong investikesen, kolektem evidens mo dil wetem ol kes blong cybercrime.”
Sergeant Natapei i notem se taem oli stap tren olgeta kriminal aktiviti i stap finis long komuniti.

Seventeen Vanuatu fisherman i stranded
Seventeen Vanuatu Fisherman oli stranded o oli stak i stap long kaontri blong Japan from we oli no karem COVID vaccine.
Director blong Foreign affairs Dipatmen, Yvon Basil i talem se ol fisherman ia i sud travel i ko long New Zealand blong bodem repatriation flaet blong tumoro i kambak long Vanuatu.
Mbe hemi talem se niufala rul blong COVID long New Zealand i mekem se oli nosave travel i ko long kaontri ia from oli no tekem stik meresin blong COVID.
Mr Basil i talem se oli stap toktok wetem Chinese Embassy mo olgeta long Japan blong helpem olgeta.
Kavman blong New Zealand i talem se ol man we oli travel i go long New Zealand oli mas providem wan pruf blong ful vaccination blong stik blong COVID mo even olgeta we oli transit nomo.
Ministry blong Health i talem se las repatriation flaet blong yia ia 2021 hemi stap long tumoro, December 4.
Mo repatriation bae i stat bagegen long manis January 2022.
VBTC Nius i kasem toksave se Kavman i stopem repatriation ia long shot taem blong alaoem ol frantline wokman blong selebretem festive season wetem ol famili.
Repatriation long namba December 4 ia hemi blong ol studen blong Samoa mo Fiji we oli kompletem stadi blong olgeta.

Professor Clive Moore, save man blong Australia long sait long Australian na Pacific histori long Queensland University i tok long Australia, i nogat wanpela luksave olsem insait long konstitusen long ol indigenous pipol.

Lidaship insaed long Executif blong Gavman blong Vanuatu i kat bikfala nid blong lukluk bak long TRUST blong wan wan lida insaed long National Palemen.
Ripablik blong Vanuatu i rikodem 3 Lida nomo we oli serv longtaem olsem Praem Minista afta long Indipendes long 1980.
Longtaem Prime Minister hemi Late Honorobol Father Walter Lini we i bin serv olsem fes Praem Minista stat long 1980 kasem 1991.
Nambatu Lida we hemi serv longtaem hemi wan long ol Francophone Lida Hon. Maxime Carlot KORMAN we i bin serv olsem Prime Minister klosap long 5 yia start long nabawan disemba 1991 kasem 21 disemba 1995.
Nambatri Praem Minista blong kantri we i serv longtaem olsem Hed blong kantri hemi brata blong late Walter Lini we hemi Current Deputi Praem Minista, Ham Lini VANUAROROA we hemi serv olsem Praem Minista start long 11 disemba 2004 kasem 22 september 2008.
Apart long trifala lida ia, Late Hon. Walter Lini, Hon. Maxime Carlot Korman wetem Hon. Ham Lini, ol nara foma Prime Minister oli nomo serv longtaem olsem Head blong Exceutif blong Gavman.
Current Praem Minista, Joe NATUMAN hemi stap olsem namba 18 Praem Minista long namba 10th Palemen, since we kantri i kasem Indipendens blong hem.
